title: Tame Aperture
description:
Welcome to the Tame Aperture podcast, where we talk all things movies...from first-time directors, indie films, art house and much more. Join us in the conversation.

Subscribe on all streaming platforms! 

www.tameaperture.com
@dutchanglepics

title: Our Man Ernest
description: Hosts Frank and Jos discuss the life and times of Ernest P. Worrell!

title: Happy Hour with Victabulous!
description: Entertainment reviews, discussions and analysis accompanied with mixed beverages resulting in heavy doses of sarcasm and laughter!

title: Watch With Jen™
description:
3-time national award-winning writer & full time walking movie encyclopedia Jen Johans of FilmIntuition.com delivers a steady stream of great movie recommendations, thoughtful career deep dives, & first rate conversations with critics, authors, actors, journalists, filmmakers, and more on Watch With Jen.™️

Originally launched on Patreon (https://patreon.com/FilmIntuition), where new installments premiere first, once each episode is unlocked to the public, you'll be able to find every episode here as well.

title: Platicando con Jacque Podcast
description: “Platicando con Jacque” es un podcast creado por Jacqueline Sarabia inspirado en experiencias y personas que ella admira y le han ayudado a lo largo de su vida. Esperando que como ella, tu también puedas conectar con historias de triunfo, entrega y dedicación para enamorarte de la vida y seguir adelante.

title: Stout Un Film Podcast
description:
Un podcast énergique et sans compromis; on regarde des films avec une bonne pinte de bière artisanale à la main. Joins toi à nous dans notre aventure pour explorer des petits joyaux non-explorés mais surtout, pas assez appréciés! Bonne écoute mais aussi, bonne bière!

We also have a few episodes in English although we mainly do them in French so be on the lookout for English episode titles !

title: Theo's Podcast Show
description: Welcome! Theo and Nadah shares dialogue on daily issues; political views; musical topics; film and animation; sports; travel and more! Hell we discuss everything except gossip while enjoying our favorite adult beverage!

title: Views in Paradox Film Club
description: A filmmaker, an actress, and usually a guest discuss a new film each week. Follow us on Instagram @viewsinparadox to find out what's to coming, and join our Facebook Group if you love to talk about film!

title: Medium Cool: A Movie Podcast
description: Medium Cool: A Movie Podcast is a weekly show focused on discussing film like a bunch of nerds. Please subscribe to get film reviews, interviews, retrospectives on movies, genres, and filmmakers, and much more. Our host, Austin Glidden, will take you along for the ride as we explore the world on the silver screen. Don't just be cool... be medium cool. Are you ready?

title: Hollywood Casting and Film
description:
Hollywood Casting and Film is a casting website and a production company offering breakdown services across the United States. 

Throughout our episodes you will learn more details about the films we are casting for and you will have the opportunity to better prepare for your auditions!

Make sure to subscribe to stay updated!

title: Ghouls On Film
description:
In the grand tradition of Goth Talk & Men On Film comes GHOULS ON FILM, an interview based podcast from two lifelong horror gays. Step into the crypt with 
directing duo Roman Chimienti and Tyler Jensen (Scream, Queen! My Nightmare On Elm Street) as they sit down with a variety of creative friends and colleagues to discuss the thrills and horrors of bringing their nightmares to life.

title: Lasting Looks
description: We take you behind the scenes of pop culture's most iconic looks! We are set costumers who are obsessed with pop culture, fashion, and of course, costumes. We want to shine a light on costume designers and stylists to give them the credit they deserve!

title: InHinesight
description: People everyday are trying to figure life out and make sure we feel successful at doing it. For me, Matt Hines, this journey has led me to want to understand more about people's own successes in life. Not the objective ones like Fortune, Fame and Glory, but the dark valley’s people had to rise up through to get to the next peak within their life’s journey. I’m doing this as a sort of time capsule for myself to better understand what it means to be true to yourself as you follow that inner beacon and pursue your values and how the success from those choices evolved you into the present day person we see before us.

title: The Nightsisters Podcast
description: A Star Wars Podcast dedicated to uplifting and highlighting the women that make the Star Wars fandom great. Weekly interviews by Madison Fairchild.

title: Bonus Features
description: Jacob and Marten bring you conversations with writers, directors, actors, academics, authors, podcast hosts, and fellow film freaks, delivering in-depth chats that, in one way or another, pair well with the movie(s) of the week.

title: The Things We Do: Podcast
description: A Podcast talking about Film, Life, Television, Culture, Mental Health and all that Fun Jazzy Stuff. Hosted by Martin Theobald

title: Travolting
description: A weekly investigation into the strange filmographies of cinemas most fascinating careers.

title: The Reel Girls Club
description: The Reel Girls Club, hosted by Lucie Rose, is a podcast to educate, inform, inspire and empower girls who want to work in cinema and television. In the podcast, I interview women in the industry, providing you with expert knowledge, tips and inspirational anecdotes about their careers.

title: SuperImage, Ltd.
description: Join Kyle and Carlos Plummer, the filmmaking duo of SuperImage, Ltd., as they interview and discuss filmmaking stories both past and present with fellow collaborators as well as industry professionals in this in-depth exploration of film, art and life in the modern age.

title: The ROQ Initiative
description: Podcast hosted by Diego Roque where we incorporate some comedy and dive in with creatives from all different sort of fields touching on the featured guests experiences, growth, taste, and more. Have a laugh, get in-depth and informed by tuning in!

title: Cinemagic
description: Cinemagic is a weekly look at the world of film and television. Ric and Janathan will look at everything from the current scene to past works. Each episode will bring something new from watch-alongs to interviews with industry professionals.

title: The Deeper Into Movies Podcast
description:
Conversations about cinema
with host Steven T. Hanley

title: Totalfilm Podcast
description: Novinky, rozhovory s filmaři, pohledy do zákulisí, analýzy filmového byznysu. Nejsledovanější trailerový kanál českého YouTube do vašich uší.

title: Oscarbate
description: we probably havent thought this through, but we aren’t going to listen to the cop in our heads…we have takes and we are goin to give them, with or without anyone else input. Lack of oxygen meets investigative reporting  meets the guests you know and love, meets fun recommendations meets hard driven attitudes, you don’t wanna miss

title: MIFF Unscripted
description: MIFF Unscripted brought to you by the Muslim International Film Festival is a podcast bringing together Muslim filmmakers, artists, creators, and more to discuss some serious and fun conversations alike.

title: Framework: The Last Podcast About Film
description:
A film-centric podcast featuring various young filmmakers as they talk about how a single frame relates to the bigger picture. Producers, writers, directors, and cinematographers break down films and dig deeper into the art form as a medium for storytelling in this modern world. 

YOUTUBE  ►  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNlJ-KQroklp-XQXqLjssyA

title: Reel Collections w/ Edward Beasley
description: A film history podcast that dives into the more obscure titles and filmmakers that helped shaped my love of cinema.

title: Portalville
description:
Comedy, Celebrity Interviews...and Horror. Welcome to Portalville. Hear what made us one of Apple Podcast's top 10 Comedy Fiction shows of 2022!

Subscribe to our YouTube channel & watch our celebrity interview videos: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCubA2hHRSpeZzG7r4FBD8_g/

(Rad horror synth vibes for this show are provided by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio):

White Bat Audio - YouTube

title: The Yellow Shirt Podcast
description: A one-on-one podcast where actor and YouTuber Tom Spoors (TXM) interviews a new creative every week about the content they create, their inspirations and processes. Tangents are common and frequent.

title: Scranton Talks
description: Are you an aspiring filmmaker? Do you love film? Or are you new to filmmaking? Scranton Talks is the podcast for you! It is inspirational, informative, and fun talks with other filmmakers about their projects and their journeys. Scranton Talks is part of the Independent Film Creative Hub. Based in Scranton, Pennsylvania, hosts Luz Cabrales and Desiree Zielinski founded the Independent Film Creative Hub which is geared to help filmmakers reach their potential in becoming successful creative artists!

title: Swervinn’ Podcast
description: Welcome to The Swervinn’ Podcast my people! I’m your host Darryl (Swerve_o) Buckhanan. Many have been on this ride & many are just joining but this isn’t just any podcast. This is the life of me as well. The guest I have within the platform are close within my life or true influencers. This pod will have many laughs but you will be able to take a little something from each guest and myself every episode as we vary from, life talks, mental health, the future, psychedelic talks, sports, music & always some Swervinn Q&A with every guest. So be sure to follow, catch up & stay tuned because the Swervinn’ is just really starting.

title: Two Halves Podcast
description: Keith Rock It, Bex and Blerdoc!

title: Caropop
description: There may be nothing more inspiring and entertaining than relaxed, candid conversations among creative people. Mark Caro, a relentlessly curious journalist and on-stage interviewer, loves digging into the creative process with artists and drawing out surprising stories that illuminate the work that has become part of our lives. The Caropopcast is for anyone who wants to dig deeper into the music, movies, food and culture that they love.

title: The Mailroom
description: Hear from the unheard voices of Hollywood with "The Mailroom." Each week welcomes a different up-and-coming entertainment industry professional to talk about their current role, experiences breaking into the industry, and future aspirations. New episodes every Monday!

title: Beauty and the Beazts
description: Podcasts discussing current episodes in The Walking Dead universe.

title: The Nobody's Podcast
description: Have you ever been listening to a podcast that has no relativity to your life at all? Well you've come to the right place. The Nobody's are average people like you and I, and here, we decide if we think they deserve to stay Nobody's, or if they have what it takes to be a Somebody. Do you think you have what it takes to be famous? lets find out.

title: Fright Fights
description: Join your co-hosts, Chris Lacks, Tyler Cavin, and Mike McKinney, as they deep-dive into the darkest crypts of our favorite film genre. Three films enter, and one film wins.
author_name: Chris Lacks, Tyler Cavin, and Mike McKinney

title: ReelHorrorShow
description: Join Lee and Mark, two lifelong horror fans and grumpy old gits, as they bring you news, reviews and interviews from the world of horror.

title: The Sound of Cinema
description:
Zonder muziek blijft er weinig over van een film. Want hoe eng is Jaws zonder geluid, hoe episch Star Wars zonder aanzwellend orkest? En hoe verliefd zijn Olivia Newton John en John Travolta zonder discobeat? Film schuurt, film knalt, film zucht, film klikt. En Filmhuis Den Haag laat het allemaal horen. In deze podcast reis je door de geschiedenis van de filmmuziek. Open je oren voor intiem pianospel, melancholische strijkers, opzwepende discobeats... of juist helemaal niets. Luister mee en je ziet meer!

The Sound of... is een klinkend programma dat schuurt, knalt, zucht en klikt. Met talks, podcasts, playlists, expo’s en meer, open je je ogen voor alles wat film te bieden heeft. Nieuwe geluiden, vertrouwde geluiden, tegengeluiden – Filmhuis Den Haag laat ze weerklinken. Luister mee en je ziet meer!

Meer weten? Ga naar https://filmhuisdenhaag.nl/the-sound-of-cinema

title: HORRORAMA
description: Horrorama es una plataforma de discusión para fans del cine de terror que pretende mostrar todo lo nuevo respecto películas, series, soundtracks y franquicias, así como revaluar clásicos así como joyas pérdidas alrededor del género. Conducido por: Mike Sandoval y Dengue

title: We Are Not Reviewers
description: Tom Spoors and Aaron Murray, two passionate film fans, discuss films, the industry and more, all whilst barely knowing what they're talking about and not being qualified to do so!

title: T's Reel Talk Podcast
description: T's Reel Talk Podcast is a conversation with some of the most talented and innovative filmmakers and audiences who love an occasional watch. From directors, actors, writers, and so on... We will be diving into the process, art, and lifestyle of filmmaking from every aspect. Even the occasional discussion with audiences who love a specific type of show or film.

title: Mormon Book Reviews Podcast
description: "Where an Evangelical Encounters the Restoration"

title: Dream Baby Dream
description: Welcome to the DREAM BABY DREAM podcast. My name is Taylah Clements, and I talk all things life, acting, creative industries, mental health and just how to get by. Total disclaimer: I am not an industry professional, far from successful right now, but I feel I have a lot to chat about.

title: Inclusion at Work by No Limits Media
description:
Welcome to Inclusion at Work where we show the value and ability of people with disabilities through thoughtful interviews.

Our host is Larry Rothstein, bestselling author and filmmaker focused on producing films and documentaries that improve job opportunities for people with disabilities.

This podcast is brought to you by No Limits Media (NLM), a non-profit dedicated to helping all people with different abilities live lives of opportunity and achievement through films, videos, podcasts, television, web, documentaries, art exhibits, and educational curriculum. Learn more at https://nolimitsmedia.org/

title: Obscuria Filmcast
description: There are currently close to half a million movies in circulation that date from the turn of the 20th century to the present day.  Obscuria Filmcast explores the countless films of note that have slipped through the cracks of history for one reason or another.  Our selections include box office flops that went on to become cult classics, made-for-TV movies that hold a special place in our hearts, groundbreaking documentaries that you've probably never heard of, as well as any obscure film with an emphasis on the strange, surreal, or grotesque.  Each week we rotate to a different host who presents a film for the other hosts to watch for the upcoming episode.  If you'd like to suggest a film for an upcoming episode and be featured as a guest on our special clubhouse edition of the podcast, feel free to email us at obscuriafilmpodcast@gmail.com.

title: Andy's Podcasts
description: Early stages.

title: Sweeping The Country with Jimmy  Carter & Derik Walker
description: With over 70 years of collective broadcasting experience, we will take you on a journey that will make you think, laugh and sometimes cry! We'll talk news, current events, music, entertainment & more! With celebrity guests that will give you a "Back Stage Pass". It's "Sweeping the Country" with Derik & Jimmy...be part of it!

title: The Mike Figgis Podcast
description: A straight talking podcast about film, photography, music and whatever else crops up.

title: The FilmUp Podcast
description:
Welcome to The FilmUp Podcast, Your Home For All Things Filmmaking. We are Aryeh and Christina, Founders of FilmUp. Here we explore the journey of accomplished filmmakers and their road to success. 

Each podcast episode will be dedicated to a non-profit of our guest's choosing. We dedicate each podcast episode to a non-profit of our guest’s choosing to both highlight our interviewee’s passion outside of filmmaking and bring awareness to a good cause. Our goal is to use Film to move the world Up - FilmUp. 

Come join us for this week's episode and let's explore the world of filmmaking together.

title: Dezil & Reeser
description:
Each episode, hosts Stefan Dezil and Jeffrey Reeser explore two films from past and present, how they relate and differ and how the cinematic medium is continuing to evolve. 

Jeffrey Reeser is a filmmaker and writer from Ojai, CA whose credits include the features "Shadow of a Gun", "Take None Give None", "Super Heady" and the forthcoming "Snake Oil Song". He currently resides in Los Angeles.

Hailing from NY and South FL, Stefan Dezil is an American genre filmmaker, actor and illustrator of Haitian descent. He has worked with Disney, 20th Digital, VICE, Noisey, and Soundcloud. For his film "The Treadmill", he was nominated for the prestigious international Lumen Prize in the moving image category.  His latest, "THIRST" is currently streaming on HULU.

title: Steeping DIY
description: A Doors At Seven project to provide listeners with a close and intimate conversation with anyone and everything having to do with DIY music, art and more.

title: Friend-chising
description:
Welcome to my podcast, Friend-chising! 

This is where I have separate interviews with some of my best friends in which we discuss their favorite transmedia franchises, what their point of entry was, paratexts they engage with, and more.  

 I am primarily interested in people's own world-building experiences, interactivity, and immersion (ie playing a videogame, going to Disneyworld, etc). Inevitably, I will be addressing what fan culture means to them about the franchise of their choice. 

Recorded at the outbreak of COVID-19, I had this idea due to the state of the world, and how I felt like more than ever transmedia could be a way to find respite when everything was constantly changing.

title: Not The Final Cut
description:
Just a couple of guys here to talk about movies and have a good time!
Join Us!

title: Now Then Talks
description:
NOW THEN! A podcast that discusses commercial and creative filmmaking. Our guests lay bare the ups and downs of finding a voice within an ever-changing and, at times, unforgiving industry.

This podcast is hosted by Ozzie Pullin and Craig Bingham, fellow directors and close friends.

title: A.J. Chat
description: Covering topics in Film, TV, interviews with celebrities  and pop culture. And fun!

title: BYTE-SIZED | A Limited Podcast Series from the Reality Bytes Independent Student Film Festival
description:
BYTE-SIZED is a student-produced podcast by Emily Fried and Ben Raeside accompanying the 2022 Reality Bytes Independent Student Film Festival. The goal of this podcast is to shed light on the students who run the festival, independent student filmmakers who have submitted their films, and the faculty who have created, directed, and judged for Reality Bytes. 

Find more info about Reality Bytes on our website: http://realitybytes.niu.edu 

Where to watch the official selection after the festival, free of charge: https://vimeo.com/channels/1780343 

You can find Ben at the Multiverse Madness podcast, wherever you get your podcasts. You can also find Emily at @emilyfinchat on Instagram and Twitch.

Produced by Emily Fried, Ben Raeside, and Dr. Laura Vazquez.
Hosted by Emily Fried and Ben Raeside.
Cover art and music by J. Fried.

title: Couch Conversations
description: Couch Conversations with Justin Couch focuses on interviewing public figures, athletes, pro wrestlers, musicians and well known content creators on social media. We dive into the stories of each individual and provide entertaining videos uploaded to Facebook and YouTube.

title: From Suarez's Basement - A Communication, Media, and the Arts Podcast
description: Are you looking for an exclusive, behind-the-scenes sneak peek from some of your favorite TV shows, movies, play, musicals, concerts, and more? Then, From Suarez’s Basement is the podcast for you! Our goal is to build a bridge between YOU, the audience, and those experts in the Communication, Media, and Arts fields. Our mission is to keep you informed, educated, and entertained by having meaningful conversations with the professionals who make the magic happen! In each episode, we welcome a new guest to speak about media industries’ present and future states, their work, and other essential matters. We want to welcome you to our family, and if you really like what we are doing, don’t forget to subscribe to our audio and video podcast in the links below for new episodes bi-weekly.

title: Mutant City Horror
description: A low budget podcast about low budget horror - Each episode Mathias the Ill and Rated-PG get together over drinks to review low budget horror movies.

title: The Video Store
description: A weekly chat amongst friends working a shift at local video store. You know, the place you can go to once a week whenever it's movie night! Interesting customers pop in to rent something all the time. Come for the advice on what you could watch but stay for the characters you will come to love.

title: El Replicante
description: El Replicante es un lugar sobre cultura popular. Un espacio para hablar sobre cine, series, películas, cómics, libros, mangas y todo lo que tenga que ver en ese amplio espectro del ocio y el entretenimiento.

title: L'Isola Nascosta Podcast
description:
Fabrizia Cao intervista i protagonisti dell'"Isola Nascosta", un cortometraggio basato su "Ila", il tredicesimo idillio di Teocrito, presentato in sala il 18/05/2022 al Cinemino.

Un’isola nascosta, un viaggio impossibile. La morte del giovane Ila e la colpa presunta del suo mentore Eracle. Mito e realtà si incontrano nell’adattamento per schermo di Ila, il tredicesimo idillio del poeta greco Teocrito. 

Tutti i retroscena e i segreti della produzione del corto dalle parole degli attori e della crew.

Ora disponibile in alcuni cinema a Milano, per sapere le date segui @isolanascostafilm su Instagram, Facebook, YouTube.

title: Just Chit Chatting
description: A podcast where I literally just sit and chit chat about every topic in the books!

title: Midnight Terrors
description: A podcast hosted by two brothers-in-law celebrating all things horror!

title: The Revenant Studios After Hours Podcast
description: This is a series where we interview Directors, Producers, Actors, Writers, and anybody else in the world of film.

title: Martini's Up Podcast
description:
A Tri-weekly Podcast made FOR Production Assistants BY Production Assistants. 

Host: Alexis S.
Music By: Jesse Rack$on
Sound Mixer: Jake Jurich

title: The Coffee House Experience
description: A Podcast to discuss things pertaining to Bengal and Bengali people. Our informal discussions (a.k.a. Adda in Bengali) are long, topical and largely spontaneous. We mostly talk in Bengali and occasionally in English. The channel is run by three Engineering graduates from Jadavpur University, namely, Pratyay Mukherjee, Srinjoy Ganguly and Soumik Ghosh.

title: FLEXXXZONE
description: The FLEXXXZONE podcast is a platform that gives our voices a place to be heard. Its more than a podcast, it's a home for our cultures history and a voice for our future.

title: Parche Magistral
description: Parche Magistral es un espacio de difusión para artistas. Nos interesamos por los procesos creativos que van detrás de las obras. Aquí cualquiera puede hacerlo Magistral.

title: Movie Marathon
description: Join Andrew and Mike as they try to recapture the magic of the movie marathons from their youth. Email us at moviemarathonwam@gmail.com. Follow us on Twitter at @moviemarathonAM

title: FILMD Chats
description: FILMD Chats

title: Batman the Animated Series Podcast
description:
A podcast where DC Comics artist & writer Will Robson and mega Batman fan Alex Robson, delve into the critically acclaimed Batman the Animated Series! 
This podcast takes a close look at this groundbreaking series, including: episode reviews, cast and crew interviews, toy and merchandise retrospectives, character designs, music reviews, comic book influences, and so much more. 
This is the definitive podcast for all BTAS fans and one you won't want to miss!

title: DR BEN Chats with...
description:
Medical writer and broadcaster Dr Ben chats with various SUPER-DUPER COOL people, like scientists, musicians, actors, athletes and other very special guests. Here, you'll find a mix of past radio shows and interviews. 

Prefer live radio? Tune in live to Cornwall's Coast FM to hear more!

title: The CultWorthy Classic
description: A cinema podcast dedicated to obscure films and cult classics made before 1970!

title: GRAYZONE
description: A New Interview Podcast

title: The Immediately No Podcast
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in! I am here on a mission to entertain and become one of your best friends! I take on multiple topics, regular life struggles, pop culture and any other themes that might come up in my head! Always ending each episode with some food for your soul, some may say *the vibes are immaculate here*.

Have a great day everyone!

My other media:
TikTok, Instagram & Youtube: MarielaaMorales

title: EL CAFE DE RICK
description:
EL CAFE DE RICK - La web del Cine Clásico.
Los mejores Documentales del Cine Clásico: Películas,generos,actores,actrices,directores

title: Que•💕•Pedishhh !!!
description: Welcoming everyone to this amazing aventura con un Pedishhh chingon !

title: 39 Minute Conversations
description: Screenwriter, actor, comedian, and shut-in Brian T. Arnold hosts a podcast about reconnecting with old friends and making new ones. But, he's only got 39 minutes to do it because he will not be paying for Zoom Pro. Conversations feature screenwriters, comedians, filmmakers, actors, and more. Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

title: The VaMo Radio Podcast
description: The VaMo Radio Podcast gives the inside scoop into the music, acting, modeling, and entertainment industry with special celebrity guests & updates on their upcoming projects and endeavors. We also have our "Featured Artist Spotlight" where we highlight an up and coming artist sharing news of their new music releases and projects. We also give exclusive views into our upcoming endeavors with open welcome to the public.

title: Cinema Pathway
description: Cinema Pathway Podcast is about the craft of filmmakers who are active in the film industry in the United States & around the world. We have assembled this venue to start an honest and friendly conversation about how unique every individual is in their craft's approach as they manifest themselves professionally with different experiences, styles, and techniques with our host, Howard Brande. We will get you up close and personal with every one of our guests, going deep into a conversation that will bring enlightenment to your career path in this fantastic world of cinema. It is an opportunity to hear great filmmakers of all types of the spectrum who have one thing in common, their love for cinema.

title: AltWire Podcast
description:
Welcome to the AltWire podcast, where we share candid interviews with some of the best names in the Entertainment Industry. Hosted by Derek Oswald.

SUPPORT US AND HELP US GROW: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/altwire/

title: The Watchful Knight's Week in Review
description: Tune in each week to hear The Watchful Knight expand on his reviews of the past week, give you a film to keep on your radar, and other recommendations! Follow @thewatchfulknight on Instagram and watchfulknight on Letterboxd.

title: Living To Write
description:
Welcome to the Story Summit Podcast - Living To Write. This podcast is presented in collaboration with David Paul Kirkpatrick, founder of Story Summit. In each episode, screenwriter Brian Landwehr and writer-director Bailey Patterson delve into conversations with accomplished writers to explore their creative processes, triumphs, challenges, and insights.

Living To Write features raw, unfiltered discussions with authentic individuals.

title: LowKey Curious
description:
A Visual podcast delivering the witty, non-professional opinions of a bunch of awesome, diverse chicks and one average white dude, who all work together at an Entertainment Production Company. This motley crew will be covering essential adulting topics such as dating, movies, societal taboos, pop culture, crypto and other things to help you better navigate through this pile of crap called life. 
 
Stay tuned for weekly episodes (unless we royally screw up).

title: Cinema Vixens
NT Movie Reviews
description: Nick Tiffany's Movie Reviews has been a destination for film reviews, podcasts, talent interviews, and all sorts of information on movie news for over a decade! Now, we offer an audio take on the latest films and news in the world of cinema. We'll cover theatrical releases, streaming and digital releases, film background information, and we'll offer more in-depth discussions about particular films as well.

title: The Greg Gab
description: Greg is a witty conversationalist looking for the scoop on all things young filmmakers. His podcast, The Greg Gab is a bi-weekly podcast where he sits down with your favorite ‘under 30’ film-makers and through inquisitive conversation, aims to learn for about them, their upcoming projects, and their process to making it happen.

title: Burnt Orange Dreams
description: Hi, this is a podcast about films. I will speak with writers, directors, actors, composers, cinematographers, and just about anyone else connected to films and filmmaking. Oh and TV shows. I love music too, so I will definitely talk to some musicians. Um, I'll talk to chefs and cooks about food too. I might talk to some authors. Politics? Most likely! I know that podcast logic is that you should only talk about one thing, but I probably won't. Maybe Burnt Orange Dreams is just about the things that I am passionate about. Yeah, that sounds about right.

title: Esserenero Show
description: Esserenero Show è un format di interviste a personaggi noti all’interno della comunità nera che possono fingere da ispirazione per i giovani afrodiscendenti. Il format si sviluppa anche al di là delle telecamere: le interviste sono svolte in live in teatro per incontri con soggetti conosciuti a livello nazionale e internazionale. Esserenero Show é condotto da Marlon Brandão , attore angolano dalla personalità carismatica

title: The London Horror Society Podcast
description: Chatting with pioneers of independent horror to demystify the process and share the info you need to make your film. New episodes every Friday.

title: Afterimages
description: Afterimages is a podcast for cinephiles that takes a deep dive into moving images. Each episode features a special guest who is invited to explore a film of their choice with your hosts, film writers Franck Boulègue and Marisa C. Hayes.

title: Viatge a Júpiter
description: El pòdcast de la Filmoteca de Catalunya.

title: The WATCHLIST Podcast
description: Join up-and-comers Josh Toomes (@joshtoomes.films) Ellis Pignanelli, Felicity Horsfall and Archie Smith as weekly they go through their MOVIE/TV WATCHLIST and discuss what's going on in the film world right now.

title: The Good Film Archive
description: TGFA is a platform for film lovers from the MENA region. We Journey through films from all over the world, trying to answer one simple question: What's a good film?

title: The Reel Thing
description: From Bergen Filmklubb comes 'The Reel Thing', a podcast hosted by Joe Lawrence, in which he covers the films included in the film club's existing and upcoming program. Join him as he discusses the movies, the film industry, and much more with guest stars ranging from members of the club, to industry professionals.

title: The Popcorn Podcast
description: Hosted by Dylan Annasingham, The Popcorn Podcast brings together like-minded individuals, including fellow film enthusiasts, filmmakers and content creators alike, to discuss all things film, television, art and entertainment!

title: Create Your Opportunity Podcast
description: Yo whats up Im Jeff Williams Jr and I am launching a new podcast called ‘Create Your Opportunity pod’.  Twice a Month I will be sitting down with individuals who I believe are real "difference makers" in their respective industries. My guests will include Professional Athletes, Tv Personalities, Actors, Real Estate agents, and much much more. During these interviews we will dive into my guest journey, learn what keeps them motivated, and break down how they’ve created opportunities themselves. AND Hopefully give you, the viewer, the motivation and ‘blueprint’ to create your own!

title: Greetings From Beyond Radio
description: This channel is dedicated to the pursuit of discussing the Supernatural, Demonology, Unsolved Mysteries, Horror and engaging our listeners to better give them what topic they would want us to cover but to give them a voice amidst this journey we all call life.

title: Fandom Sessions
description: We bring you interviews from talented people in all mediums of entertainment including your favorite movies/TV, anime, and comics as well as coverage of some of our favorite pop culture events and conventions!

title: The Sidekick Critic Podcast
description: Welcome to the Sidekick Critic Podcast! It's time we gave attention to all the Robins of the world, especially while looking at the film industry. In that vein we are happy to present this new film & entertainment industry podcast! Our love for film and seeing movies in theaters has spawned this new podcast. Join us while we review the newest releases to theaters, highlight the sidekicks of each film we review, and look at the film industry at large and give our thoughts on it!

title: Studio Six Productions
description:
We do live streams for the paranormal community as well as educate people in the paranormal field. My name is Jay, and I am the founder of Studio Six Productions, I am also a Psychic Medium who not only interviews people in the paranormal field but other members of the collective spiritual community. Such people like Mediums, researchers, Authors, Actors, musicians, ect. We have 3 shows under this banner, 2 of which I host. Come give us a listen.

..

I am also petitioning funds for a start up paranormal documentary show in which I hope to start within this year. Donations are very welcomed

https://gofund.me/9a5d536d

title: SKST Radio Network and Podcast
description:
SKST Radio Network; Podcast offers a variety of great shows. The Kami Grayson Show debuted in 2021 from SKST Radio studios in Virginia. SKST along with Authors, Reel Talk, Artist Network, and Small Business Network. She began her career in radio/podcast in TX in 2009 and quickly developed a reputation for her warm and honest ability to talk and meet with Movie Stars, Celebrities, Directors, Actors, and artists. Her quick wit and sometime no-filter fun interviews. Fans quickly fell in love with Grayson's candor, which also can ruffle feathers among some of those entertainers along the way. Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/skstradio/support

Kami Grayson, Podcast Hostess

title: Lister: In Conversation
description: Join Ben Lister every week as he interviews some of the biggest radio stars within England!

title: Zbliżenia. Alicja Resich
description:
Cykl podcastów video Alicji Resich pokazuje największe gwiazdy w Polsce z niedostępnej dla większości osób i mediów strony. Jakimi wartościami kierują się w życiu? Co daje im szczęście? Które doświadczenia i relacje ukształtowały ich biografie i wpłynęły na kierunek rozwoju? Rozmowy Alicji Resich z artystami i przedstawicielami show-biznesu motywują i zachęcają do działania i rozwoju.

Alicja Resich to niekwestionowana ikona polskiego dziennikarstwa. Autorka i prowadząca pierwszego talk show „Wieczór z Alicją". Mistrzyni wywiadu. Od sześciu lat realizuje w Polsacie program "W bliskim planie".

title: IN with LINDA DANO
description: Interviews with people from Daytime, Fashion & The Arts and just talking about everyday life.. Tune IN with Linda Dano!

title: The All Bro’s
description: The All Bro’s are two bros that enjoy a good film and all things superhero-related. They talk about all the things that they find interesting in the world of film and also talk about all their collectible purchases like Funko Pops, Blu-Ray Steelbooks, and also breakdown movies that they’ve seen to give them a final grade. Join two bros on their adventure to give movies the rating they truly deserve.

title: Mysfit Live
description: Mysfit Radio Is a networking platform for up and coming Artist to share, promote, and interact with one another on a more personal level.

title: Flash Johnson | Director's Cut
description: "Director's Cut Hosted by Flash Johnson" is an esteemed show meticulously crafted by the visionary Flash Johnson, with production handled by the esteemed collaboration of Movies Only Productions and MSB Films. This exceptional series aims to fulfill its objective of captivating audiences by conducting profound and insightful interviews with the world's foremost music video directors. Through engaging discussions, this show delves deep into the behind-the-scenes perspectives and remarkable stories of these industry giants, while inspiring and igniting the aspirations of the next generation of talented directors.

title: Cuentame Cosas
description:
¡Bienvenidos a Cuentame Cosas! Este es el espacio donde la curiosidad y la intriga se encuentran. Exploramos una amplia variedad de temas fascinantes y misteriosos en forma de podcasts, entrevistas y otras secciones emocionantes.

En nuestros episodios de podcast, te sumergirás en relatos cautivadores de eventos históricos intrigantes, enigmas sin resolver y fenómenos sorprendentes. Te llevaremos de la mano en un viaje de conocimiento y entretenimiento, descubriendo detalles sorprendentes que te dejarán pensando.

Además, Cuentame Cosas te brinda entrevistas exclusivas con expertos, investigadores y personas apasionadas por diferentes áreas de estudio. Obtendrás una visión más profunda de los temas que exploramos y tendrás la oportunidad de escuchar las perspectivas y conocimientos de profesionales en el campo.

Y eso no es todo. En el futuro, también presentaremos otras secciones emocionantes, donde abordaremos temas adicionales, desafíos divertidos y sorpresas para mantenerte enganchado.

Suscríbete a nuestro canal para no perderte ninguno de nuestros episodios de podcast, entrevistas y emocionantes secciones futuras en Cuentame Cosas. ¡Acompáñanos en este viaje de descubrimiento y entusiasmo!

.

.

.

.

No olvides seguirnos en todas las plataformas para que no te pierdas ninguna noticia!

IG de Cuentame cosas: https://www.instagram.com/cuentame.cosas/

IG de Julio: https://www.instagram.com/juliopardog/?hl=en

IG de Gian: https://www.instagram.com/giandominici_/

title: Would You Give Me A Stagehand?
description:
Hello! Welcome to the Would You Give Me A Stagehand? podcast. Join Tobi Pitan, an aspiring filmmaker, as he interviews friends, colleagues, and various professionals in the entertainment industry and asks them how they got there. Some topics covered include how necessary is film school, joining a union, and what is it like to be in a writer's room. The industry is huge, but there's a lot of room. Join him as he asks his guests, how far are you willing to go for a career in the entertainment industry?

Special thanks to Cash O'Brien(@cash.obrien) for making the theme music.

socials:

Instagram: @tobi.pitann

Website: http://tobipitanfilms.weebly.com

Youtube: https://youtube.com/@tobipitanmakingfilms?si=kv6SUGKvJiwm-t4d

title: Massacre Radio with Membersonly Dave
description: Join Membersonly Dave, the baddest boy in Cleveland, as he jams your ears with MASSACRE RADIO! Terrifying guests of the horror film world and beyond! Spooky sketches! Silly Psyops! Are you ready?!

title: Coming Soon - Cigars & Shots
description: My name is ABee and Im a Filmmaker. lets do this!!

title: The Hunter Davidson Radio Hour
description: Come form a new para-social relationship with Hunter and his friends! Conversation, insight, goofs, gags, riffs, bits, laughs, and beer. Crack open your favorite cold beverage and come hang out for a little bit. It can't hurt.

title: Ciné-story
description:
هنا البودكاست الجديد لتحيا السينما، خيرنالو اسم سينيستوري، بصح وعلاش سينيستوري؟

.على خاطر حاولنا فيه الجمع بين الشغف الذي يدفع صانع الفيلم لإنجاز فيلمه والشغف الذي يجعل المتلقي يتحدث عنه مطولا.

اخترنا هذه المرة فيلم "تحيا يا ديدو" ليس فقط لأننا استلهمنا منه الهوية البصرية لمؤسسة ومنصة تحيا السينما بصح لأننا نعتقد أيضا أنه يشكل جزء هام من هوية السينما ككل في الجزائر

هنا، حديث جمعنا مع "مينة"، أستاذة وباحثة في النقد المسرحي في جامعة الجزائر 2.. المفارقة أن هذا الحديث ماكانش الهدف منه الوصول لقراءة نقدية ومقاربات بحثية بقدر ما أردنا الغوص من خلاله في ذاكرة سيدة تختبئ فيها صورة طفل صغير قال يوما "قولي لي يا بهجتي"

فهل مازال ذلك الطفل حيا؟

title: Woodstock Film Festival's LET'S TALK FILM! Podcast
description:
The official Woodstock Film Podcast, where we feature Alumni and friends of the festival + talk about all things indie film!

Follow us @woodstockfilmfestival on YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, & Letterboxd.

Connect with us: https://linktr.ee/WoodstockFilmFestival

title: The VHS Vault Podcast
description:
Welcome to the VHS Vault Podcast! We are so happy you found us. What we hope to do in our show is introduce you to movies you may not have seen before... forgotten gems that we like to say we 'pull from the vault.'

Our main focus is older horror movies, but we will do other types and ages of movies as well. Stick around, and get to know us! If you have any movies you'd like for us to watch, leave the name in the comments!

title: Ciné-story
description: يمكن للأفلام أن تحكي قصصا ويمكن لنا أيضا أن نحكي قصصا حول تلك الأفلام. بودكاست سينيستوري على "تحيا السينما" يهتم بالسينما، بالذاكرة، بالمشاهد وبكل القصص التي تنتج عن ذلك.

title: MNV Gowda Twitter Space Podcast
description: I host a twitter space for film makers

title: Music2PSYCHOLOGY, Είρκη Μπαζάκα, CRYSTALEX | DARK PODCASTS
description:
Η Είρκη Μπαζάκα είναι μια διάσημη στιχουργός με έντονο σκοτεινό ύφος, που έχει κερδίσει ευρεία αναγνώριση για τους ποιητικούς στίχους της. Με τη μοναδική της προσέγγιση και την ενδιαφέρουσα αισθητική, έχει καταφέρει να καθηλώσει το ακροατήριο της.

Εντούτοις, η δημιουργικότητά της δεν περιορίζεται μόνο στους στίχους. Η Είρκη εξερευνά νέα μονοπάτια ψυχαγωγίας και παρουσιάζει τον κόσμο της μέσα από ένα σκοτεινό podcast. Το dark podcast της εστιάζει στη μουσική και εξερευνά τον κόσμο των μυστηρίων μέσα από μια συναρπαστική σύνθεση των δύο στοιχείων. Με αναλύσεις, ιστορίες και ανεξερεύνητα μυστικά, καταφέρνει να προσφέρει μια μοναδική και σκοτεινή εμπειρία ψυχαγωγίας στο ακροατήριο της.

Μέσα από το podcast της, η Είρκη Μπαζάκα δημιουργεί μια ατμόσφαιρα που συνδυάζει το μυστήριο και την απόκοσμη αισθητική, καθιστώντας το ένα από τα πιο αγαπημένα και εθιστικά podcasts για τους λάτρεις της μουσικής και των μυστηρίων.

title: Year of the Movie Podcast
description: On this podcast we discuss movies that have released in the year of the movie, 2023. A lot of goofy movies have 2023 release dates, and we felt that it got so goofy an entire podcast was needed to discuss that.

title: Casual Conversation with My Life in West
description:
#Who we are-

'The Casual Conversation' is for people from the Film, TV and Media Industries, executives from different Film and TV companies, Actors, Casting Directors, Producers, Theatre, fashion industry, modelling, Talent agents, etc., are invited to talk about their life, career and their experience living in London.

The format of the podcast is very fun and straightforward.

title: The Big Screen Bulletin
description: Welcome to The Big Screen Bulletin, your ultimate destination for all things movies! Immerse yourself in the captivating world of cinema as we delve deep into the magic, art, and culture of film.

title: El Cine y...
description: Programa dedicado al cine, nuevos lanzamientos y entrevistas con jugadores clave del medio cinematográfico.

title: All Entertainment with Justin Urciuoli
description: In this podcast, host Justin Urciuoli interviews several actors and actresses from the TV/Film industry about their work in the field.

title: JuzzBaatt By Akash Season 3
description:
JuzzBaatt By Akash ✨ We chat with smart people who know their Journey, and they share their thoughts in a way that's easy to understand. that'll make your day better!"

#juzzbaattbyakash #akashchoudhary #hindipodcast

title: Filmographies Podcast
description: Join host and filmmaker Jake Laystrom as he interviews independent filmmakers on specific works from their filmographies. From shorts to features, learn about filmmaker's inspirations, lessons learned, and experiences from Pre-Production to Distribution.

title: Portrait Urbain
description:
Bienvenue dans "Portrait Urbain", une série de vidéos où je mêle la photographie de rue, les rencontres artistiques et les interviews intimes. Chaque mois, je choisis un DJ/Producteur pour une expérience unique en plein air. À l'aide de ma GoPro fixée sur ma poitrine, plongez dans mes pas et découvrez le processus de création de portraits saisissants au cœur des rues animées de villes différentes. Vous serez témoin de la fusion magique entre l'artiste et l'environnement urbain, tandis que je saisis l'essence de leur personnalité à travers des clichés uniques. En plus des photos, chaque vidéo est accompagnée d'une interview avec l'artiste, où ils partagent leur parcours, leurs inspirations et leurs rêves. Joignez-vous à moi pour une immersion totale dans l'univers créatif de ces talents et laissez-vous inspirer par leurs histoires captivantes.

Ici, je vous publie toutes les parties interview en Podcast.

Vous pourrez écouter PU de n'importe où et n'importe quand !
